description: This file contains documentation and code snippets explaining methods, component structure, and logic placement within a Blits component in a JavaScript framework. It provides guidance on organizing reactive attributes, computed properties, watchers, lifecycle hooks, input handlers, and methods in a component configuration object.

classes.name: Blits.Component
classes.description: A function or class used to define a component in the Blits framework, accepting the component name and configuration object.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: An asynchronous method in the component used to fetch data from an API and update the component's items.
